body:
Title says it all. I am currently testing out the scrimmage server and I was unable to find the way to invite other teams to be able to get on the server.
If you guys know please tell me :)
Thankss :)
body_tagged:
Title says it all. I am currently testing out the scrimmage server and I was unable to find the way to invite other teams to be able to get on the server.
If you guys know please tell me :)
Thankss :)
title: How to Invite Teams to Scrimmage Server?

replies.body: I don't think you can... Its just a one team scrimagge for now.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think you can... Its just a one team scrimagge for now.

replies.body: Since only one team can reserve the same time.
replies.body_tagged: Since only one team can reserve the same time.

replies.body: Then that is a useless scrimmage server if you can't have scrimmages vs other teams ;-;
replies.body_tagged: Then that is a useless scrimmage server if you can't have scrimmages vs other teams ;-;

reply_to.body: Since only one team can reserve the same time.
reply_to.body_tagged: Since only one team can reserve the same time.

replies.body: I guess. In our scrims we just practice with eachother :)
replies.body_tagged: I guess. In our scrims we just practice with eachother :)

replies.body: I think you can have the other team do /server scrim0#
replies.body_tagged: I think you can have the other team do /server scrim0#

replies.body: But you need to invite them or the other team had to reserve the same time. Avicus wont let us do that >.<
replies.body_tagged: But you need to invite them or the other team had to reserve the same time. Avicus wont let us do that >.<

replies.body: Learn the maps, plan out strategies, assign routes, etc.
replies.body_tagged: Learn the maps, plan out strategies, assign routes, etc.

reply_to.body: Then that is a useless scrimmage server if you can't have scrimmages vs other teams ;-;
reply_to.body_tagged: Then that is a useless scrimmage server if you can't have scrimmages vs other teams ;-;

replies.body: I think he means when the time comes to have an actual scrim.
replies.body_tagged: I think he means when the time comes to have an actual scrim.

reply_to.body: Learn the maps, plan out strategies, assign routes, etc.
reply_to.body_tagged: Learn the maps, plan out strategies, assign routes, etc.

replies.body:
I know, I've been doing that but not all teams have a private server, and when they do sometimes teams have advantages because the host is usually set to be around the teams players and it ends up being far away from most of the other teams players hence horrible ping and bad gameplay.
That is why Avicus scrim servers would make it a bit more equal since we are all used to whatever ping we have.
But it's useless when it comes to scrimming other servers, I did today a practice xd
